xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
Class AppendOnlyStrategy

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.AbstractStrategy
      xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.AppendOnlyStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Strategy, Convertable
public class AppendOnlyStrategy
extends AbstractStrategy

This class provides a append only strategy. Each record gets its own page if it does not fit into the last record used.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Finds a block with enough free space to hold the given number of bytes.

Specified by:

Specified by:

Parameters:

init

public void init(SortedMap pages,
                 int pageSize,
                 int maxObjectSize)
Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
Initializes the strategy. This call must be made, before the first real (other) operation is performed. The call can also be made multiple times.

Specified by:
init in interface Strategy
Overrides:
init in class AbstractStrategy
Parameters:
pages - SortedMap with key pageId and value of type PageInformation.
pageSize - size of each page in bytes.
maxObjectSize - Size of the largest record which can be stored inside the RecordManager.
